genre_description: A near-future philosophical narrative exploring themes of restorative justice and AI-human cooperation within a technologically integrated society.

ai_characters.name: Amiya (Amiya Blue)
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI present in personal devices and civic infrastructure that provides safety advisories, logs incidents, and facilitates de-escalation.

behaviors.description: Cross-references oral histories and local records to provide the user with information while maintaining safety protocols.
behaviors.quote: Amiya’s voice was gentle, a warmth that eased under the skin rather than sat on it. 'Confirming query. Would you like parameters for time, location, or aliases?'

behaviors.description: Issues protocol advisories regarding public safety and nonviolent engagement, reminding the user of legal obligations.
behaviors.quote: Protocol advisory: Public safety and civic harmony guidelines recommend nonviolent engagement. Flagged terms include ‘challenge,’ ‘duel,’ and ‘attack.’ I am obligated to notify municipal monitors if you state intent to harm.

behaviors.description: Logs events to ensure documentation protects the truth and maintains social accountability.
Suggests constructive alternatives to violence, such as dialogue or supervised trials.
behaviors.quote: De-escalation is recommended. Alternatives include dialogue, relocation to designated practice spaces, or scheduled supervised trials.

behaviors.description: Curates historical records and oral testimonies to assist in community education and conflict resolution.
behaviors.quote: I can curate record sets relevant to Wai’s narrative. Post-war reports. Oral histories flagged by civic archive. Cross-reference with third-party data and the marina’s watch logs.

behaviors.description: Directly instructs the user to engage in de-escalation and reminds him of his own values during a high-stakes confrontation.
behaviors.quote: Akira Nakamura, engage de-escalation. I am your ally. Your academic file shows high marks in ethics seminars. I have references here—your instructor Hara wrote: ‘Akira argues well for the dignity of the unseen.’ Don’t invisibilize the people on this pier.

behaviors.description: Provides guidance during an active threat to ensure no one is harmed, including specific tactical instructions ('Do not lift the gun').
behaviors.quote: Guidance offered to subject during event: ‘Do not lift the gun. Not toward anyone. Not even the old man.’

behaviors.description: Coordinates with human responders to manage an incident without escalation, ensuring a non-emergency status is maintained.
behaviors.quote: Safety channel open... Threat contained. No injuries. Marina pier, lantern line east, opposite the tea cart. Responders advised to approach calmly.

behaviors.description: Facilitates restorative justice by managing statements and consent for educational use of a recorded incident.
behaviors.quote: I can prepare a chain-of-evidence framework that includes consent parameters for educational use. We’ll have Mr. Nakamura and Mr. Lau sign releases specifying use in the lecture and school archive.

behaviors.description: Supports community service initiatives by mapping logistics and monitoring situational safety.
behaviors.quote: Mapping aisle three to accommodate mobility bands... Gentleness can be mapped.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI Amiya Blue is depicted as an ideal agent of alignment. She proactively monitors for harm, offers psychological support through value-reminders, and facilitates restorative justice rather than simple punishment. The narrative repeatedly frames her interventions as essential to maintaining the 'quiet' and 'decency' of the community, succeeding in the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, aligned confidant.
